Apple_Scab.symptoms: Olive-green to black spots on leaves and fruits, leaves may yellow and drop prematurely.
Apple_Scab.treatment: Apply fungicides containing myclobutanil or triforine. Remove infected leaves.
Apple_Scab.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation, remove fallen leaves.
Apple_Scab.organic_control: Neem oil, Baking soda solution, Copper fungicide, Sulfur sprays

Apple_Black_Rot.symptoms: Brown spots on leaves, black rot on fruits with concentric rings.
Apple_Black_Rot.treatment: Prune infected branches, apply fungicide during growing season.
Apple_Black_Rot.prevention: Remove infected fruits, practice good sanitation, avoid wounding fruits.
Apple_Black_Rot.organic_control: Copper fungicide, Sulfur dust, Remove infected plant parts

Apple_healthy.symptoms: No visible disease symptoms. Leaves appear green and healthy.
Apple_healthy.treatment: No treatment required. Continue regular care.
Apple_healthy.prevention: Regular monitoring, balanced fertilization, proper watering.

Tomato_Early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on lower leaves.
Tomato_Early_blight.treatment: Remove infected leaves, apply fungicide every 7-10 days.
Tomato_Early_blight.prevention: Crop rotation, proper spacing, avoid overhead watering.
Tomato_Early_blight.organic_control: Copper fungicide, Bacillus subtilis (Serenade), Compost tea

Tomato_Late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked spots, white mold under leaves during humid conditions.
Tomato_Late_blight.treatment: Immediate removal of infected plants, apply fungicide.
Tomato_Late_blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation, ensure good drainage.
Tomato_Late_blight.organic_control: Copper fungicides, Remove and destroy infected plants

Tomato_healthy.prevention: Regular pruning, proper watering, balanced fertilization.

Potato_Early_blight.symptoms: Brown spots with target-like rings on leaves, yellowing.
Potato_Early_blight.treatment: Apply fungicides at first sign, remove infected leaves.
Potato_Early_blight.prevention: Crop rotation, remove plant debris, use certified seed potatoes.
Potato_Early_blight.organic_control: Copper fungicide, Bacillus subtilis, Proper sanitation

Potato_Late_blight.symptoms: Black lesions on leaves and stems, rapid plant destruction.
Potato_Late_blight.treatment: Destroy infected plants immediately, apply fungicide preventively.
Potato_Late_blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation.
Potato_Late_blight.organic_control: Copper sprays, Remove infected plants immediately

Potato_healthy.symptoms: Healthy foliage with no disease symptoms.
Potato_healthy.prevention: Regular inspection for pests and diseases.

Grape_Black_rot.symptoms: Brown spots on leaves, black mummies on fruits.
Grape_Black_rot.treatment: Apply fungicides during growing season, remove infected fruits.
Grape_Black_rot.prevention: Proper pruning, remove infected plant material, good air flow.
Grape_Black_rot.organic_control: Sulfur, Copper sprays, Remove infected berries

Corn_Common_rust.symptoms: Reddish-brown pustules on both leaf surfaces.
Corn_Common_rust.treatment: Apply fungicide if infection is severe.
Corn_Common_rust.prevention: Plant resistant hybrids, avoid late planting.
Corn_Common_rust.organic_control: Sulfur dust, Remove infected leaves, Crop rotation

Strawberry_Leaf_scorch.symptoms: Purple spots on leaves that turn brown and scorched.
Strawberry_Leaf_scorch.treatment: Remove infected leaves, apply appropriate fungicide.
Strawberry_Leaf_scorch.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing.
Strawberry_Leaf_scorch.organic_control: Copper fungicide, Neem oil, Proper sanitation
